attributes.action: Dis-allow christmas lights to be erected and lit by councils before 1st Dec and to be taken down before the 12th Night.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Christmas should be kept for Christmas.

We feel that Christmas ( as well as our local councils' finances ) are being destroyed by the over zealous erecting and lighting of Christmas Lights. We feel they should go up no earlier than the 1st Dec. So keeping Christmas for Christmas. 
More than that, we request that outdoor town and city Christmas lights (council Christmas Lights ) should be taken down by the 12th night so avoiding bad luck and instead spreading Joy.
